Text: I think you need Norton Ghost 2003 build 775

This is NOT Norton Ghost 2003!

This is yet another fake file.
This is also Adobe Acrobat Reader 5.0.5 - Do not download unless you want to install Adobe Acrobat.

This is NOT Norton Ghost 2003.
This is Adobe Reader 5.0.5.

Try Symantec_Norton_Ghost_2003_by_Tygroso instead:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3242710/Symantec_Norton_Ghost_2003_by_Tygroso

Stop nagging. 
THIS IS NORTON GHOST 2003
It is the complete Nero-Disk image of the CD, 
and that CD contains also Actrobat reader 5.

Don't download the torrent from Tygroso, that is an older incomplete version.
This is the real Ghost 2003. It is version 793. There is also an Adobe installer on the same disc because the manuals are in PDF format.
